para.text: Endorsements to a basic business license shall be issued in the following license endorsement categories:
Motor Vehicle Sales, Service, and Repair;
Public Health: Child Health and Welfare;
Public Health: Food Establishment Wholesale; and

All Class A or Class B license endorsements to master business licenses issued by the Department prior to the effective date of the Streamlining Regulation Emergency Act of 2003, passed on an emergency basis on July 8, 2003 (Enrolled version of Bill 15-317) [August 11, 2003], are hereby redesignated as license endorsements, without designation of class, to a basic business license. Nothing in the foregoing shall be read as eliminating the criteria, established either by rule or statute, that govern the awarding of any license endorsement affected by this section.

The Department shall maintain and periodically update a roster of all businesses which have been issued a basic business license, indicating the license endorsements appended to each basic business license.
The following licenses shall not be a part of the basic business license system and shall be regulated by the Department of Health:
